thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Pete Burnett
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Pete Burnett

author: Pete Burnett
title: Pete Burnett
text: I've ordered many items from Banggood, and on some occasions items have not arrived, or the wrong item was sent, but their excellent Customer Services always reply to emails within a day, and are quick to correct the mistake, that's why I continue using there online store. Another reason for using Banggood is their vast range of goods and hard to beat prices. For the distance the items are being shipped, the delivery time is usually quite fast, and goods are well packaged. All in all well pleased with their service.
